articles.title: Is WhatsApp secretly spying and listening to your private conversations? Know the truth - DNA India
articles.description: Questions over WhatsApp secretly using people's microphone emerged after a user accused WhatsApp accessing its phone's mic at night. But is WhatsApp really spying on you? The messaging app has now responded and clarified the situation.
